left.name: program_id
left.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

data.name: program_id
data.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

left.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.
left.name: submitter_donor_id

data.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.
data.name: submitter_donor_id

left.description: Unique identifier for a follow-up event in a donors clincal record, assigned by the data provider.
left.name: submitter_follow_up_id

data.description: Unique identifier for a follow-up event in a donors clincal record, assigned by the data provider.
data.name: submitter_follow_up_id

left.description: Interval from the primary diagnosis date to the follow up date, in days.
left.name: interval_of_followup

data.description: Interval from the primary diagnosis date to the follow up date, in days.
data.name: interval_of_followup

left.description: Donor's disease status at time of follow-up.
left.name: disease_status_at_followup

data.description: Donor's disease status at time of follow-up.
data.name: disease_status_at_followup

left.description: Donor's relapse type if disease status at followup was progression or relapse.
left.name: relapse_type

data.description: Donor's relapse type if disease status at followup was progression or relapse.
data.name: relapse_type

left.description: If the donor was clinically disease free following primary treatment and then relapse or progression (for liquid tumours) occurred afterwards, then this field will indicate the length of disease free interval, in days.
left.name: relapse_interval

data.description: If the donor was clinically disease free following primary treatment and then relapse or progression (for liquid tumours) occurred afterwards, then this field will indicate the length of disease free interval, in days.
data.name: relapse_interval

left.description: Method(s) used to confirm the patient's progression disease status.
left.name: method_of_progression_status

codeList: Biomarker in liquid biopsy (e.g. tumor marker in blood or urine)

data.description: Method(s) used to confirm the patient's progression disease status.
data.name: method_of_progression_status

codeList: Biomarker in liquid biopsy (e.g. tumor marker in blood or urine)

left.description: The anatomic site where disease progression or recurrence occurred.
left.name: anatomic_site_progression_or_recurrences

data.description: The anatomic site where disease progression or recurrence occurred.
data.name: anatomic_site_progression_or_recurrences

left.description: Specify the tumour staging system used to stage the cancer at time of retreatment for recurrence or disease progression. This may be represented as rTNM in the medical report.
left.name: recurrence_tumour_staging_system

data.description: Specify the tumour staging system used to stage the cancer at time of retreatment for recurrence or disease progression. This may be represented as rTNM in the medical report.
data.name: recurrence_tumour_staging_system

left.name: recurrence_t_category
left.description: The code to represent the extent of the primary tumour (T) based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined after treatment for patients receiving systemic and/or radiation therapy alone or as a component of their initial treatment, or as neoadjuvant therapy before planned surgery, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

data.name: recurrence_t_category
data.description: The code to represent the extent of the primary tumour (T) based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined after treatment for patients receiving systemic and/or radiation therapy alone or as a component of their initial treatment, or as neoadjuvant therapy before planned surgery, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

left.name: recurrence_n_category
left.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by which is the extent of the regional lymph node (N) involvement for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined determined at the time of retreatment for a recurrence or disease progression, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

data.name: recurrence_n_category
data.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by which is the extent of the regional lymph node (N) involvement for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined determined at the time of retreatment for a recurrence or disease progression, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

left.name: recurrence_m_category
left.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined bythe extent of the distant metastasis (M) for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined determined at the time of retreatment for a recurrence or disease progression, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

data.name: recurrence_m_category
data.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined bythe extent of the distant metastasis (M) for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined determined at the time of retreatment for a recurrence or disease progression, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

left.name: recurrence_stage_group
left.description: The code to represent the stage group of the tumour, as assigned by the reporting recurrence_tumour_staging_system, that indicates the overall prognostic tumour stage (ie. Stage I, Stage II, Stage III etc.) after treatment for patients receiving systemic and/or radiation therapy alone or as a component of their initial treatment, or as neoadjuvant therapy before planned surgery.

data.name: recurrence_stage_group
data.description: The code to represent the stage group of the tumour, as assigned by the reporting recurrence_tumour_staging_system, that indicates the overall prognostic tumour stage (ie. Stage I, Stage II, Stage III etc.) after treatment for patients receiving systemic and/or radiation therapy alone or as a component of their initial treatment, or as neoadjuvant therapy before planned surgery.

left.description: Specify the tumour staging system used to stage the cancer after treatment for patients receiving systemic and/or radiation therapy alone or as a component of their initial treatment, or as neoadjuvant therapy before planned surgery. This may be represented as ypTNM or ycTNM in the medical report.
left.name: posttherapy_tumour_staging_system

data.description: Specify the tumour staging system used to stage the cancer after treatment for patients receiving systemic and/or radiation therapy alone or as a component of their initial treatment, or as neoadjuvant therapy before planned surgery. This may be represented as ypTNM or ycTNM in the medical report.
data.name: posttherapy_tumour_staging_system

left.name: posttherapy_t_category
